entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Collect all datapad components from Scavenger Thugs, Thieves and Punks to complete the collection.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You have collected all the antique datapad components requested.  Take them back to the collector for your reward.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Collect one datapad processor from a Scavenger Thug.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Collect the datapad housing from a Scavenger Punk.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Collect a storage drive from a Scavenger Thief.
